oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of allegiance, voting rights restored
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. David M. Dotson, Co. K, 37th Tenn. Inf. Regt, CSA, lost half of his foot at the Battle of Franklin and ended up a prisoner of war. One document is Dotson's oath of allegiance to secure his release from prison camp. The second document restored his voting rights in Grainger County after the war.
